We all know that this is a great game. But it isn't just "Yeah, it's great," kind of game, it's a "HOLY COW THAT WAS THE BEST FREAKIN' PUZZLE GAME I EVER PLAYED" kind of game. There's a reason it's great. The graphics look fine, the story is superb, and the best part is the gameplay, which is solid. Not too tough to throw the game out the window, but it isn't a piece of cake (ever wonder why it's a lie?). Not to mention this is probably the first puzzle game of it's kind to include a cooperative storyline that actually works well (I'm not doing any research on this.). Overall, this is one title any good gamer will not want to miss. Oh, and one more thing, no one will forget Cave Johnson's lemon rant. Classic.

[h1] Portal 2 [/h1]

Portal 2 is a game that puts you in a room with various puzzles to solve, using portals. 

If you're playing the single player, you will be faced with quite an ominious story line with very expansive and eerie environments. Along with this, there is some good humor to go along with this game. One part will have you chuckling while another will have you wanting to leave immediately. 

If you're playing the multiplayer, you are given an entirely different story line with different puzzles meant for cooperative team work, and trust that your partner will not try to kill you. 

This game has Steam Workshop support, as you can create levels for other people to play through and try to solve your puzzle, or you can download other people's levels to try and solve them yourself!

Lastly, my favorite thing about this game is the soundtrack. It can be ominous, it can be epic, and it can be uplifting. 

If for some reason you don't already own this game, you need to buy it. There is just too much fun to be had from this game that you're severely missing out.
Ну что тут сказать? Молодцы Валве

A Portal 2 tartotta az első rész tétjét és emelte azt. Mi az hogy! Még több parádés fejtörő, még több kacagtató poén, mi több, ezúttal írtak egy remek történetet a játékhoz. Ebben jóval több szerepet kap GLaDOS, akit minden gonoszsága ellenére nem lehet utálni, és képbe kerül az imádnivaló Wheatley is. Ezúttal a játék hosszúságára sem lehet panasz, a Portal 2 ugyanis jóval tovább tart, tartalmasabb és sokkal változatosabb, mint elődje volt. Ha azt imádtad, ezért bolondulni fogsz.

It's been a long time since i Played the first game, and it made me wonder what this installment could possibly bring to the table.However once the game started I was hooked. Portal 2 is a fantastic game. And I would highly recommend this to any gamer as well as the first one as it ties the story together. 

Pros:
-The story is engrossing raising the bar and filling in the gaps left by it's predecessor
-The characters and voice acting is top notch
-There are better looking games out there, but few come close to presenting the story both visually in the environment and audiotrack with such perfect execution.
-coop multiplayer
-Painting the levels with gel is just plain fun(you know what I mean once you play it)

Rating: 10/10

The game has no humor and only 1 gun. You can't even shoot bullets, but enemies can. After they shoot their bullets you can't even pick them up and put them in your gun. Best game ever <3

Glados <3

This is a fully-loaded cauldron of tasty fun. Easily the most enjoyable and satisfying game I've ever played. Voice acting and laughs are first-rate, especially if your sense of humour is black, dry or of a British bent. The levels and challenges are, quite simply, georgeous, and the gameplay flow is flawless. If you haven't seen anything of it, you just have to see the trailers, then pick it up, and flag me down for some co-op! It follows on from the original Portal, which is worth playing first, but by no means a pre-requisite.
One of the best puzzle-oriented games I've ever played.  The multiplayer action is incredible.

I just loved Portal... so when Portal 2 came out, I was super excited! I bought it, and it was a blast, like my nicest & most loving trolling dreams would be. The "conversations" are mind blowing sometimes. If you didn't play this game yet, go and play it, or you'll be my test subject someday!

Play the first one first though, it has some sort of story backed up in it. It's more fun if you know about everything.
You should buy this game, longer single player than Portal, new Science devices, and co-op is a blast!
One of the best game ever, entertaining, funny, smart, with an awesome lovable cast of characters and top notch voice acting, clever puzzles and more. A must play game.

Brilliant! Best game I've ever played. 11 out of 10 stars goes to this masterpiece game of portals! In this game your brain will be tested and you will need to think in ways you never thought possible! "thinking in portals!" This saying isn't a joke by the time you complete this game your mind will be reprogrammed to think in portals! You will go on thinking about everyday situations and solve them with portals then realize you no longer have your beloved portal gun </3

None the less, Amazing game! Amazing graphics! And now, Amazing Co-Op! Submersive storyline and loveable characters <3 If you're to buy any game i recommend this game 100% first!

Oh goodness.  What can one say about a game that already has everything said about it?  Portal and Portal 2 both have the most terrific writing jobs I've ever seen on any video game, and they did a spectacular job of immersing the player in the world of Aperture Laboratories.  Portal + portal = space travel seems simple enough, but you will never truly know how awesome these games are until you play them.
